issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
Description:
1. Create a default mobile app for alloy in studio. (File --> Mobile App Project --> Alloy --> Default Alloy Project)
2. Build & run on Tizen emulator

Actual Result:
1. The app launches with red screen.
NOTE: Dismiss the error and notice that two tabbed application is launched. However it is single window application.
(Refer screen shots)

Expected Result:
1. The app should launch without error with single window.
fields.summary: Tizen: Emulator fails to launch default alloy project
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.8.5,
Titanium 3.2.3 SDK,
Alloy 1.3.1,
CLI 3.2.3,
Tizen 2.2
